text: Hi, can you tell me how we can create responsive in boilerplate theme

Are Flex Columns tags still going to be used in combination with DnD tags in templates? Is there any plans of deprecation of Flex column tag? We use those Flex column tags a lot so just trying to prepare of potential changes HubSpot may start changing

Flex columns are still permitted, you can use them in the same templates as dnd areas.

There are no plans currently to deprecate flexible columns. That said since dnd_areas support everything and more that flexible columns support there’s not much reason to use flexible columns any more.
<@U7SL518D6>, so when using DnD snippet code, it inserts extra html surrounding code of DIVs, is there parameters I can add to strip out that extra DIV code
No. That extra HTML facilitates the content creator’s ability to use the styling settings.
